testdat is an R package extending the unit testing framework of testthat to data frames.

## Getting started

As an extension of testthat, testdat uses the same basic testing framework. For 
a simple introduction to testthat, see the section on testing in
[R packages](http://r-pkgs.had.co.nz/tests.html).

The main addition in testdat is a set of expectations designed for testing data
frames and a mechanism to attach a data frame to a context.

The different classes of data expectation are:

- [generic-expectations]
- [conditional-expectations]
- [value-expectations]
- [datacomp-expectations]
